radiographic_examinations.findings: Ground-glass nodule in the left lower lobe measuring 3.6 mm; mild bibasilar atelectasis; tiny hypodensity within the hepatic dome; large fluid collection within the right hemipelvis measuring approximately 4.2 x 6.8 x 5.1 cm; surrounding fat stranding and adjacent bowel wall thickening along the cecum and ascending colon; likely perforated appendix; no gross free air; no significant free pelvic fluid.
